response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is worth an estimated $1,500,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product from us at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving of $300,000 compared to its intrinsic value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can further customize this product to meet your unique requirements. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
